sentences.en: a safety harness
sentences.cn: 安全带

sentences.en: At Opera North he will be in harness with Paul Daniel, the conductor appointed music director last year.
sentences.cn: 在北方歌剧公司，他将和去年指挥指定的音乐总监保罗·丹尼尔通力合作。

sentences.en: Bridle is a harness.
sentences.cn: 马勒是一件马具.

sentences.en: Harness the pony and we'll go for a ride in the cart.
sentences.cn: 给那匹小马套上马具,我们要坐车出去逛逛.

sentences.en: He paid ten dollars for the new harness.
sentences.cn: 他花十美元买了这件马具.

sentences.en: He was almost strangled by his parachute harness straps.
sentences.cn: 他差点被自己的降落伞吊带勒死。

sentences.en: I harness the horse to the cart.
sentences.cn: 我把马套在车上.

sentences.en: I'll go and harness the beast.
sentences.cn: 我去套牲口.

sentences.en: Karl Marx had tried to harness the German will.
sentences.cn: 卡尔·马克思曾试图驾御德意志民族的意志.

sentences.en: On Sunday the horses were harnessed to a heavy wagon for a day-long ride over the border.
sentences.cn: 星期天这些马被套在一辆沉重的货车上，踏上长达一天的旅程越过边境。

sentences.en: The brothers work in double harness.
sentences.cn: 哥俩一起工作.

sentences.en: The old man says that he intends to die in harness.
sentences.cn: 那老人说他打算工作到死.

sentences.en: The order , which totaled 1870 yuan, was for 340 sets of " harness ".
sentences.cn: 这张订单总计一千八百七十元, 定制三百四十付 “ 马具 ”.

sentences.en: The vet had improvised a harness.
sentences.cn: 兽医临时凑成了一副马具。

sentences.en: to harness a horse
sentences.cn: 给马上挽具

sentences.en: Turkey plans to harness the waters of the Tigris and Euphrates rivers for big hydro-electric power projects.
sentences.cn: 土耳其计划利用底格里斯河与幼发拉底河的水来建造大型水力发电工程。

sentences.en: We can harness the power of the wind to generate electricity.
sentences.cn: 我们可以利用风力发电。

sentences.en: We must harness the rivers which overflow annually.
sentences.cn: 我们必须治理那些每年泛滥的河流。

sentences.en: When it returns to shore, the life-jacket will deflate and revert to a harness.
sentences.cn: 返回岸上后，救生衣就会瘪掉，恢复成背带状。

sentences.en: You can rest for three or four months and then the longing for work will return and you will be right back in harness.
sentences.cn: 你可以休息三四个月，然后又会开始渴望工作，并能很快回到正常的工作状态。

words.tran_cn: 马具；甲胄；挽具状带子；降落伞背带

phrases.tran_cn: 安全带；安全吊带；安全挂钩具

trans.tran_en: a set of leather bands used to control a horse or to attach it to a vehicle it is pulling
to control and use the natural force or power of something

trans.tran_cn: 利用，给（马等）套轭具，控制
trans.tran_en: to put a harness on a horse
